name: Boring Road Trip
description:
This is my submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

The theme of the game is: It is not real.

The time when you're on a long roadtrip in the back seat as a child and your imagination runs wild. Watching the scenary getting filled with enemies, monsters and obstacles for you to jump over and beat to a pulp.

The game includes a level and a boss fight. He fun!

Please enjoy!

Created by NitrostormBCN and Art by MajimartBCN

Credit to:

- Jamoy's Adventures(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFZiyIrdnkLZ8DFZ5vOUxXA).
